page.title: 12Shopping
page.content: The only{shop}in{Bolton Abbey}is the {Post Office,}where you can buy stamps, sweets, and tourist things. People go to the{supermarkets}in {Skipton, Ilkley, Keighley, Leeds, and {Bradford}once a week for{groceries. For other things such as{clothes}they go to the shops in those places. Many people choose things from {catalogues}which are delivered by post, and pay for them in instalments. Very few goods are delivered by shopkeepers now. The only regular {delivery van}is for bread and cakes, which comes from{Harrogate.
